tool_description: This application is a set of APIs that allows developers to easily extract useful information from various types of documents. The first endpoint, "text extraction", allows for the extraction of text from PDF files. The second endpoint "metadata extraction" allows for the extraction of metadata from a document such as the author, date created and file size. The third endpoint "table extraction" allows for the extraction of tables and their data from a file given in the request argument 'file'...
name: File Scanner
title: File Scanner

api_list.name: PDF Extract
api_list.description: Allows for the extraction of text from PDF files

api_list.name: Metadata Extract
api_list.description: Allows for the extraction of metadata from a document such as the author, date created and file size.

api_list.name: Table Extract
api_list.description: Allows for the extraction of tables and their data from a file given in the request argument 'file', such as an xlsx or csv file with tabular data
